scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the martyrdom of Saint Sebastian. A man, dressed in a red tunic with a gold trim, blue sleeves, and a golden hat, stands on the left, drawing a golden bow and aiming an arrow towards the saint. Saint Sebastian, on the right, is depicted with a halo, his body pierced by multiple arrows, and his lower body is bound with ropes. He is unclothed except for a white loincloth. The background is a green landscape with trees and a blue sky, framed by an arched, gilded border.
